channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OPENJPA-1293] JUnit test failure when using Derby 10.5.3.0
item.description:
Only hit one test failure in o-p-j when using Derby 10.5.3.0 -

Tests run: 15, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 9.901 sec <<< FAILURE!
testVariableHaving(org.apache.openjpa.persistence.jdbc.query.TestJDBCGrouping) Time elapsed: 0.246 sec <<< ERROR!

item.summary: JUnit test failure when using Derby 10.5.3.0

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
